meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>cry</kanji> <kanji>voice</kanji> is a sound of <vocabulary>crying</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>sob</vocabulary>. Don't cry! Kanji will get easier someday!
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the vocab words 泣く and 声. So long as you know those two words okay, you should be able to read this word too!
